name: Go Pete Go
description:
Go Pete Go isn't monkeying around in this fun and amazing game of island adventure!

Go BANANAS with Go Pete Go!

Pete is a pirate monkey in a bubble on an adventure! Tap the screen so you can help Pete's bubble stay aloft. This will keep you collecting coins, blowing up totems, and even battling with dragons for massive points, power-ups, and bonuses! Use your pirate ship to eliminate the totems as you make your way through the exotic island! Shoot down the yellow dragons with your bananas to earn 10 coins! Shooting down the red dragons holding the pirate will help you energize your pirate ship's armaments to take out the totems. Be sure to swipe in all directions to dodge and weave your way around any existing totems and fire-rings or you will turn Pete into a pile of putrid monkey meat! Be sure to collect all of the coins in this fun and action packed game! The search for treasure on this amazingly mysterious treasure filled island has been the doom of many pirates and explorers! Can you keep Pete alive and get all of the shiny coins?
Go Pete Go Features:

• Bonus levels!
• Awesome adventure gaming
• Fantastic coin collecting and power-ups!
• Banana shooting for laughs and profit at its very best
• Amazing color-filled graphics that bring life to a great gaming experience
• Earn 5 hearts and 10 bananas every day that you log in and play this captivating game!
• Get free hearts and bananas by watching ads or just choose to purchase them through the app!
• Acquiring hearts allows you to start again where you left off on your epic pirate monkey adventure!
• Professionally developed, expertly designed graphics, and superior game play that you won't want to stop playing!

People are going BANANAS for Go Pete Go!
Go Pete GO is a brilliantly created all-ages game that people love to play! From the action, to the adventure, and the massive coins, this game totally rocks bananas!
Invite your friends and family to go on a Go Pete Go adventure with your social media sites! Everyone loves Pete!

Tap your way to treasure and enjoy the most awesome monkey antics as you float along and take part in one of the best and most creative gaming experiences to hit the app stores in a very long time! Take your treasures and claim your glory with Pete! Don't delay, start playing Go Pete Go, you will not be disappointed with this game that people around the world are going bananas for! Put on your war face and face down the epic dragons with super huge bonuses! Easy to understand and challenging to play gaming characteristics make this fabulous game extremely addictive and well worth playing! Get on board and start your epic pirate monkey adventure today!
